text: Sodium dichromate is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is Na2Cr2O7. It consists of sodium and dichromate ions. It is an orange crystalline solid. It is an intermediate in making chromium. It is used to make leather. It is also used in making organic chemical compounds. It is a strong oxidizing agent and a toxic carcinogen. == Related pages == *Potassium dichromate *Sodium chromate *Chromate Category:Sodium compounds Category:Chromium compounds
title: Sodium dichromate
